Package com.g1.mychess.match.service.impl

Class MatchResultServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.match.service.impl.MatchResultServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchResultService
@Service public class MatchResultServiceImpl extends Object implements MatchResultService
Implementation of the MatchResultService interface. Handles the finalization of a match by updating the results of the players based on the match outcome. This includes handling the case of a draw or win/loss between participants. Ensures the match status is updated and the match data is saved upon completion.

Throws: - MatchNotFoundException if the match with the given ID does not exist. - PlayerNotFoundException if any player involved in the match cannot be found in the list of participants.

  • Method Details

    • completeMatch

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> completeMatch(Long matchId, Long winnerPlayerId, Long loserPlayerId, boolean isDraw)
      Finalizes the match by determining the outcome (draw or win/loss) and updating the player results accordingly. Updates the match status to completed and saves the match and player data.
      Specified by:
      completeMatch in interface MatchResultService
      Parameters:
      matchId - The ID of the match to complete.
      winnerPlayerId - The ID of the winning player (relevant only if the match is not a draw).
      loserPlayerId - The ID of the losing player (relevant only if the match is not a draw).
      isDraw - A flag indicating whether the match is a draw.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the result message of the operation.
      Throws:
      MatchNotFoundException - if the match with the given ID cannot be found.
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the given player IDs are not found among the match participants.

    • getMatch

      public Match getMatch(Long matchId)
      Retrieves the match by its ID.
      Parameters:
      matchId - The ID of the match to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Match object associated with the given ID.
      Throws:
      MatchNotFoundException - if the match cannot be found.
